# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/react-intl`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for react-intl (http://formatjs.io/react/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/react-intl

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Sat, 23 Dec 2017 16:04:56 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: ReactIntl
